channel.title: Zdr problem..?
channel.description: Ive just recently started working on the zdr source that has been released and the portals and other objects seem to delay before they show and sometime they dont show at all. Is this server or client sided and is there a way to fix this?

item.title: Zdr problem..?
item.dc:creator: @3rd_Hokage 3rd Hokage
item.description:
@3rd_Hokage wrote:

note: there is alot more but i have deleted some thing.
because i have a maximum lenght for 20000
but…
What could i change in here?

Read full topic

item.title: Zdr problem..?
item.dc:creator: @XLBuggaLX XLBuggaLX
item.description:
@XLBuggaLX wrote:

Basically what you have to do is delete the timer in the ObjectsSpawn.java Look for a time with a number next to it and delete that, they will spawn automatically then :).

Read full topic

item.title: Zdr problem..?
item.dc:creator: @d4rk_iz_fir3 d4rk iz fir3
item.description:
@d4rk_iz_fir3 wrote:

Yes, I compiled it and I doubt it has anything to do with the portal id’s because ive been on other zdr based servers and they use the same portals the real zdr used…

Read full topic
